roleset.name: Becoming cloudy
roleset.note: Expanded by Julia based on BOLT, WN eventive noun lexicon, cloud.01. VNcls other_cos-45.4 corresponds, for some reason, to 'clouded', but I assume it is supposed to be 'cloud', and applies here either way.

example.name: all args; actual cloud
example.text: And with that he resumed his clouding the room with his foul-smelling smoke.

example.name: args 0, 1; metaphorical
example.text: Reid had been struggling with enough demons without his clouding the issue.
